878060.name: Masters of Puzzle - An Urban Walk
878060.description:
We present to you An Urban Walk: a professional high-quality photography provided by our friends from More About Travel*. Check out their blog, a link to which you can find in the community section of the game, for more wonderful pictures and contact information. You won't be disappointed. We hope you'll enjoy this great puzzle box as much as we do.

Content Details

Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle. This puzzle image features a big variety of details including some sections that look similar and will certainly provide a great challenge for skilled puzzle builders. You will be able to access this content from within the base game. It will only be downloaded on demand by using the corresponding in-game menus in order to preserve storage space and bandwidth.

* Note: The photography is used by Belleal Games with the explicit permission of More About Travel for the purposes of creating this puzzle box. It remains their property and cannot be copied, shared, or distributed by third parties without their permission.
